strictly_necessary_cookies.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
strictly_necessary_cookies.description: You need these for personalised services to work. If you sign in to comment on stories, for instance, our system needs a cookie to remember who you are.

cookies.name: palak
cookies.description: Description missing.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: __gads
cookies.description: Used by Google's DoubleClick for Publishers (DFP) AdServer to manage the display of online advertisements. It can help avoid showing the same ads over and over again.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: __cb
cookies.description: Used by the Chartbeat real-time analytics platform. We use Chartbeat to improve the user experience on CBC properties.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: __cb_ls
cookies.description: Used by the Chartbeat real-time analytics platform. We use Chartbeat to improve the user experience on CBC properties.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: _cb_svref
cookies.description: Used by the Chartbeat real-time analytics platform. We use Chartbeat to improve the user experience on CBC properties.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: _chartbeat2
cookies.description: Used by the Chartbeat real-time analytics platform to distinguish between new and returning visitors in order to calculate visitor frequency. We use Chartbeat to improve the user experience on CBC properties.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: _chartbeat4
cookies.description: Used by the Chartbeat real-time analytics platform to store the last time when a page is unloaded in order to calculate time spent. We use Chartbeat to improve the user experience on CBC properties.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: _chartbeat5
cookies.description: Used by the Chartbeat real-time analytics platform to assign traffic to the link on a page from which someone clicked over. We use Chartbeat to improve the user experience on CBC properties.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: _vfa
cookies.description: Used by Viafoura, our authentication and commenting partner. Viafoura enables users to log in to CBC.ca for posting comments, subscribing to newsletters and other personalized features.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: akaas_feed
cookies.description: Used by the Akamai Content Distribution Network (CDN) do determine whether to show you a cached copy of the content or to fetch a new one from CBC's servers. This allows you to load content faster and saves computing resources.

cookies.name: cX_P
cookies.description: Used by Cxense, our Search and Analytics provider, to identify a browser (with NO personally identifiable information) across sessions. This is used to help index and score content for our internal search engine and is deleted after 365 days.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

cookies.name: cX_S
cookies.description: Used by Cxense, our Search and Analytics provider, to identify a browser (with NO personally identifiable information) within a session. This is used to help index and score content for our internal search engine and is deleted when you close the browser.
cookies.value: Your browser doesn't have this cookie

third_party_cookies.title: Third Party Cookies
third_party_cookies.description:
These are set by someone other than the owner of the website you're visitng.
Some CBC web pages may also contain content from sites like YouTube or Flickr, which may set their own cookies. Also, if you Share a link to a CBC page, the service you share it on (e.g. Facebook) may set a cookie on your browser.
The CBC has no control over third party cookies.
